item.title: Tones And I - Dance Monkey
item.description:
They say
oh my God
I see
the way you shine
Take your hand
my dear
And place them
both in mine
You know
you stopped me dead
While
I was passing by
And now I beg
to see you dance
Just
one more time
Woo I see you see you
see you every time
And oh my I I I
I like your style
You
you make me
Make me
make me wanna cry
And now I beg
to see you dance
Just
one more time
So they say
dance for me
Dance for me
dance for me oh oh oh
I’ve never seen
anybody
Do the things
you do before
They say
move for me
Move for me
move for me ay ay ay
And
when you’re done
I’ll make you do it
all again

oh my God

my whole life

one more time
